vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπικάλυμμα [κᾰ], ατος, τό,
cover, veil, πλοῦτος πολλῶν ἐ. ἐστιν κακῶν 4th-3rd c.BC: Menander Comicus 90.
__II. in animals, covering of any orifice, of the gills of fish, [Refs]; of the opercula of crabs and other crustacea, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
cover-up, covering, veil
a covering, veil;, metaphorically a cloak, 1Pet. 2:16*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 覆蓋物
2) 覆蓋, 掩飾 (彼前 2:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 覆盖物
2) 覆盖, 掩饰 (彼前 2:16)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cái màn che; che đậy. Xem G1943
